content: Update copy: AI-Generated Reply → AI Suggested Reply, AI Activity Log → Audit Log, Activity Timeline → Interaction Timeline, All Queues → All Tickets
Change Add button to 'Add Interaction' (remove icon)
Make right panel cards more cohesive and connected (remove gaps, unified design)
Add ticket status dropdown in middle panel header
Remove all gradient circle avatars throughout the app
Create Reports page with placeholder content
Create Knowledge Base page with placeholder content
Create Settings page with logout moved there, make settings icon functional
Make notification icon functional with dropdown
Test all changes and new pages
